description:
The Bill Milne paved pathway goes from the Ribbon Creek parking area (near hostel) to the Wedge pond parking area.
It's an easy ride with about 130 meters elevation ( up hill in direction from Ribbon creek to Wedge pond).
Great mountain scenery. Trail can easily be walked, in winter part of it may be track set for Cross country skiing.
directions: Ribbon Creek parking area off Highway 40 near Kananaskis village or Wedge pond parking area, about 10 km south of entry to Kananaskis village.
title: Bill Milne Trail (Evans - Thomas)
